item.title: 【ホロライブ】ときのそら、9周年記念イベント「9th Anniversary Party」をぴあアリーナMMで開催決定！「夢は、ひとつ先のステージへ」
item.author: ホロミ
item.content:encoded: VTuberグループ・ホロライブ所属の「ときのそら」さんが、自身のX（旧Twitter）および公式情報を更新し、活動9周年を記念するイベント『ときのそら 9th Anniversary Party』の開催を特報として発表しました。開催日は2026年11月7日（土）、会場は数多くのアーティストが伝説を残してきた「ぴあアリーナMM」です。特報を受け、ファン（そらとも）の間では早くも期待の声が高まっています。横浜の地に響き渡る歌声と、記念すべきパーティーがどのようなものになるのか、11月の開催に向けて注目が集まります。『ときのそら 9th Anniversary Party』は、2026年11月7日（土）にぴあアリーナMMにて開催予定です。

item.title: 常闇トワ＆獅白ぼたんのサイン入り色紙が当たる！『灰仭巫覡』新PV＆オリジナルソング公開記念キャンペーン開催
item.author: ホロミ
item.content:encoded: 大暮維人先生が描く人気漫画『灰仭巫覡（カイジンフゲキ）』のオリジナルソングと新PVの公開を記念し、2025年9月5日より豪華プレゼントキャンペーンがスタートしました。新PV公開！常闇トワ＆獅白ぼたんが歌うオリジナルソング2025年9月3日、講談社の「マガジンチャンネル」にて『灰仭巫覡』の新たなプロモーションビデオが公開されました。このPVのために書き下ろされたオリジナルソング『君と明かした夜』は、ホロライブ所属の人気VTuberである常闇トワさんと獅白ぼたんさんが歌唱を担当。今回の発表を記念して、抽選で1名様にが当たるキャンペーンが開催されます。『灰仭巫覡』公式X（旧Twitter）アカウント（@KAIJINFUGEKI_WM）をフォロー ※「#灰仭巫覡PV公開」「#カイジンフゲキ」のハッシュタグが付いたポストが目印です。 2025年9月5日（金）0:00 〜 2025年9月14日（日）23:59まで 利用規約に同意し、日本国内にお住まいで郵便物・宅配物の受け取りが可能な方。注意事項：色紙には当選者の宛名が記載されます。当選者にはXのダイレクトメッセージにて連絡があります。 『灰仭巫覡』コミックス第1巻から第5巻まで好評発売中です。

item.title: 【速報】戌神ころね、ホンダのeスポーツ大会アンバサダーに2年連続で就任！→本人も「よろしくお願いします」と意気込み「世界の戌神」「今年もきた！」
item.author: ホロミ
item.content:encoded: 人気VTuberグループ「ホロライブ」所属の戌神ころねさんが、本田技研工業（Honda）が主催するeモータースポーツのグローバル大会「Honda Racing eMS 2025」の公式アンバサダーに、昨年に引き続き就任したことが発表されました。このニュースに、ファンからは「2年連続はすごすぎる！」「今年も応援します！」といった声が相次いでいます。「Honda Racing eMS」は、世界3地区（アジア・オセアニア、米州、欧州・中東・アフリカ）のトップドライバーたちが地域最速の座をかけて競い合う、本格的なeモータースポーツのグローバル大会です。戌神さんは「Honda Racing eMS 2024」でもアンバサダーを務めており、今回で2年連続という大役を担うことになります。ゲーム実況で人気を誇る戌神ころねと、世界のHondaとのコラボが再び実現しました。2025年8月26日、Honda Racing eMSの公式X（旧Twitter）アカウントが「━ Honda Racing eMS 2025 開催 ━ 昨年に続き『戌神ころね』が公式アンバサダーに！」とポストし、戌神さんのアンバサダー就任を正式に発表。あわせて、されるという大会スケジュールも公開しました。この公式発表に対し、戌神さん本人も自身のXアカウントで「今年もアンバサダーを務めさせていただきます！よろしくお願いします」と引用ポストし、就任への意気込みを表明しました。この就任のニュースに、ファンからは「世界のHondaに認められた女、戌神ころね」「ころさんの影響力すごい！」「これを機にレースゲームに挑戦してみようかな」など、驚きと喜びのコメントがありました。

item.title: hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Holoearth Booth Announcement
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your support of Holoearth.Holoearth will be exhibiting a booth at “hololive SUPER EXPO 2026,” one of the largest offline events hosted by hololive production, to be held at Makuhari Messe from March 6 to 8, 2026.At the Holoearth booth, we plan to screen special footage from past events such as the “Arrival Festivals” and “NePoLaBo Live,” featuring hololive production talents.There will also be displays where visitors experience Holoearth’s journey so far in a real-world setting, including life-size panels of talents from past Arrival Festival events.We hope you enjoy the world of Holoearth at hololive SUPER EXPO 2026!

item.title: Octopus x hololive 3rd Generation Physical Card Collection is Now Available for Pre-Order!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: February 27, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce the renewed collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, unveiling a special series of physical Octopus card sets featuring the talents of hololive 3rd Generation.Octopus Card Collection DetailsThe hololive 3rd Generation Octopus Card collection comes in two versions: a Single Card Set and a Collector’s Set, tailored for both practical users and passionate collectors.Dressed in autumn‑winter school uniforms, the four members are ready to accompany you across Hong Kong—ride the MTR, board double‑decker buses, tour on trams, and sail the harbour—making them part of your daily commute and city exploration!Set Includes: ・ hololive 3rd Generation Physical Octopus Card ・ Octopus Card Holder with LanyardSet Includes: ・ hololive 3rd Generation Physical Octopus Card ・ Octopus Slide-on Card Holder ・ Card Display Stand ・ Acrylic Shikishi Artboard ・ Gift Box PackagingPre‑order your exclusive Octopus Card today and let hololive 3rd Generation members join you as you journey through Hong Kong!Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

item.title: “Aki Rosenthal Birthday 2026 Encore in Holoearth” Event Announcement
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!On March 13, 2026, a virtual concert titled “Aki Rosenthal Birthday Encore in Holoearth,” featuring Aki Rosenthal from hololive production, will take place in Holoearth.Virtual Concert “Aki Rosenthal Birthday 2026 Encore in Holoearth”In Holoearth, become your own avatar and share the same space as Aki Rosenthal. Enjoy an immersive experience from your favorite perspective within arm’s reach.This event will also feature exclusive MC segments you can only see in Holoearth, along with a special venue, stage production, and cheer items.Stay tuned for more details! Aki Rosenthal Birthday 2026 Encore in Holoearth March 13 (Fri), 2026 at 21:00 (JST) (Schedule is subject to change.)

hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S) is coming to Singapore on May 16, 2026!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: February 16, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce its participation in the special event, “hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S).” This event will be held in Singapore on May 16, 2026 as part of the 60th Anniversary of the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between Japan and Singapore (SJ60).Four globally recognized hololive production talents representing different regions will participate: (hololive / Tokyo Tourism Ambassador): #hololive_SJ60: hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S): Saturday, May 16, 2026: Jurong East Stadium (Singapore): Albirex Niigata Singapore vs Young Lions: 3,500 spectators: SGD 21 (± JPY 2,500): DOU Creations Pte Ltd: Football Association of Singapore* The football match will be held as an official Singapore Premier League fixture. Separate match tickets are required.On match day, the stadium will be transformed into a unique entertainment experience combining real sports and virtual culture.Planned highlights include: ・ Screening of original music videos ・ Special greetings & Q&A session (pre-recorded) ・ Multilingual challenge segment ・ Exclusive halftime performanceIn addition, Mori Calliope is scheduled to host a YouTube mirror livestream, allowing fans worldwide to enjoy the event online.■ Livestream Schedule (Subject to Change) May 16, 2026 (Sat) 19:30 – 22:30 (JST) A detailed timetable will be announced at a later date.SJ60 Limited-Edition Collaboration MerchandiseExclusive collaboration merchandise featuring newly illustrated visuals will be available both onsite and through advance online sales, through an event-exclusive website. Items ship to Japan and all 11 countries and regions in Southeast Asia. For detailed information, please visit the official collaboration website. ・ Replica Uniform (1 type)・ Acrylic Stands (4 types): February 16, 2026, 10:00 (JST): March 1, 2026, 17:00 (JST)* With limited exceptions, merchandise will be available primarily through advance sales. * On-site sales on match day will be extremely limited. Advance purchase is strongly recommended. * Selected items will be available exclusively via pre-order.For online sales and the latest updates, please visit the official campaign website.Significance as an SJ60 Commemorative EventThis project represents a future-oriented cultural exchange, bringing together Japan’s leading digital entertainment brand and Singapore’s community-rooted Japanese football club .Through the fusion of VTuber culture and live sports, the event aims to create an unprecedented celebration of friendship between Japan and Singapore for the next generation.: Official announcement & merchandise sales begin: Event dayDOU Creations Pte. Ltd. is a Singapore-based business strategy and marketing consultancy dedicated to breaking down market borders and supporting Japanese companies and content to expand overseas, particularly in Southeast Asia. The company provides comprehensive services spanning business strategy development, market research, product planning, and local execution of branding and marketing activities. With a mission to help Japanese products and cultural IP reach global audiences, DOU Creations has supported initiatives such as the operation of Japanese Film Week events and cultural festival booths abroad.

item.title: Notice of Price Changes (Feb 20 Update)
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Thank you for using the Holoearth service.In a commitment to a more accessible platform for users, we are sold in Holoearth.The revised prices can be confirmed in the in-app purchase screen from the effective date. There will be no change to the purchase price of HoloCoin (Premium). There will be no changes to content that has already been purchased. This revision applies only to ; user-made items will not be affected. Maintenance will be performed on . The specific time will be shared at a later date.Thank you for your continued support.

Visit both Tokyo Station and Narita Airport shops to get an exclusive postcard!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: To celebrate the opening of “hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport!” we are excited to announce a special collaboration campaign with the “hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station.”During the campaign period, bring a receipt from one shop to the other to receive an exclusive, limited-edition postcard (not for sale) as a special gift! Don’t miss this chance to visit both locations and collect these unique rewards. Friday, February 13, 2026 – Monday, March 9, 2026・ hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station Venue: Tokyo Character Street, B1, First Avenue Tokyo Stationhere for more details.・ hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport! Venue: Central Bldg. 4F, Terminal 1, Narita Airporthere for more details. 1. Make a purchase at either participating shop. 2. Bring your receipt to the other shop. 3. Show your receipt to the staff at the cashier to receive your postcard.* Staff will mark the receipt once the gift has been redeemed. The exclusive postcards (not for sale) come in 5 designs in total, and designs vary by shop and distribution period.・ At hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) – Feb 27 (Fri) Phase 2: Feb 28 (Sat) – Mar 9 (Mon)・ At hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) – Feb 20 (Fri) Phase 2: Feb 21 (Sat) – Feb 27 (Fri) Phase 3: Feb 28 (Sat) – Mar 9 (Mon)・ Postcard designs will change according to the schedule at each shop. ・ Supplies are limited and will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis while stocks last. ・ Only receipts issued during the campaign period (Feb 13 – Mar 9, 2026) are valid for redemption. ・ Each receipt is valid for one (1) postcard. ・ We cannot accept returns or exchanges for the postcard, except in the case of defective items. ・ Please check the official website of each facility for business hours and access information.

Funko POP! x hololive production Figurines Have Been Announced!
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: February 2, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is thrilled to announce a collaboration with Funko, releasing a series of POP! collectibles featuring hololive production talents Sakura Miko, Mori Calliope, and Takanashi Kiara. This new collection marks the first collaboration between hololive production and Funko. Fans can look forward to these collectibles hitting shelves and opening for global purchase at a later date, also available on the hololive production OFFICIAL STORE from late March 2026.For more information on the product release, please visit Funko’s official website and social media platforms.Funko is a leading pop culture lifestyle brand that creates high quality products for fans to connect with their favorite fandoms. Through its iconic Pop! vinyl figures, apparel, and accessories, the company translates the world’s most popular movies, shows, and digital creators into tangible collectibles.

item.title: NePoLaBo 10-Second Video Contest Results
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!We are pleased to announce the results of the 10-second video contest for the virtual concert “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.” Thank you for the many great submissions! All of the entries that conveyed the love for NePoLaBo and the passion of the performance moved the entire staff.After a careful review, the winning entries that shone especially brightly have been selected and are presented here. Winners will receive a commemorative in-app gift: “NePoLaBo Live Celebration T All Members Ver. (Signed).” We will contact the winners via X direct message.Momosuzu Nene Winning ClipOmaru Polka Winning Clipsレギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん An overwhelming display of star power—you can feel the aura from any angle! The idea to film it behind was brilliant!See the post here.Yukihana Lamy Winning ClipsShishiro Botan Winning Clipsレギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さんHoloearth Tourism Agency Special Mentionsらぴす〖雪民〗さん X ID: @lapis5303 The very “Urya-oi!” that became an in-app gesture! The fact that it captures not just Nene but also Lamy’s dancing really scores points!See the post here. X ID: This adorable moment between Nene and Botan is captured perfectly! It is an emotional scene that makes you want to see even more of their close moments.See the post here.

item.title: Capcom Announces New Monster Hunter Wilds x Hololive Collaboration
item.author: James Richardson
item.content:encoded: Capcom has announced a major new collaboration between Monster Hunter series and the popular VTuber group Hololive.
